data.eml:eml: Systematics of South American snail-eating snakes (Serpentes, Dipsadini), with the description of five new species from Ecuador and Peru

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Arteaga, Alejandro, Salazar-Valenzuela, David, Mebert, Konrad, Penafiel, Nicolas, Aguiar, Gabriela, Sa ́ nchez-Nivicela, Juan C., Pyron, R. Alexander, Colston, Timothy J., Cisneros-Heredia, Diego F., Yanez-Munoz, Mario H., Venegas, Pablo J., Guayasamin, Juan M., Torres-Carvajal, Omar (2018): Systematics of South American snail-eating snakes (Serpentes, Dipsadini), with the description of five new species from Ecuador and Peru. ZooKeys 766: 79-147, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.766.24523, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.766.24523
